desc: Watergate Bay Surf School now taking bookings for 2022. Private Family lessons and courses. Newquay's #1 rated Family Friendly Surf School, small PRIVATE groups. Surf School at Watergate Bay. 5* star rated and Travellers Choice Award on tripadvisor. Private courses with bespoke tuition.

layout.text: "Highly recommend, best money we spent all holiday and memories that will last a life time"
WE SPECIALISE IN PRIVATE FAMILY AND GROUP LESSONS. MAXIMUM RATIOS OF 1:6 MEANS YOU'RE IN EXTREMELY SAFE HANDS
